import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function PageForm() { const[nom,setNom]=useState(); const[prenom,setPrenom]=useState(); const[age,setAge]=useState(); const [afficher,setAfficher]=useState() function handlForm(){ return setAfficher("votre nom est: "+nom+" prenom "+prenom+ " et age "+age) } return (
Connexion
handlForm()}>
setNom(e.target.value)}/>
setPrenom(e.target.value)} />
setAge(e.target.value)}/>
{afficher}
) }
